sections.heading: of members.The members of the credit union shall not be personally or individually liable for the payment of its debts solely by virtue of holding membership in the credit union

sections.text:
21-1746.Liability of members.

The members of the credit union shall not be personally or individually liable for the payment of its debts solely by virtue of holding membership in the credit union.

SourceLaws 1996, LB 948, ยง 46.
